newsitem.title: USA: S+P adds, to MidCap 400 index.
newsitem.headline: S+P adds, to MidCap 400 index.

text.p: Standard & Poor's said on Friday that it will add Health Management Associates Inc and Stewart Enterprises Inc to the S&P MidCap 400 Index after the close of trade on July 1, replacing Healthsource Inc and Portland General Corp.
Standard & Poor's also said in a news release that it will add Westwood One Inc to its S&P SmallCap 600 after June 30, replacing Roosevelt Financial Group Inc.
All the changes were made due to pending mergers and acquisitions, Standard & Poor's said.
